{"description":"`furo-de-bounce`
 is a component with a input-wire, that, as long as it continues to be triggered, will not
 be invoked. The wire will be triggered after it stops being called for
 N milliseconds. If `immediate` is passed as a attribute, it triggers the input-wire on the
 leading edge, instead of the trailing.","summary":"event de bouncer","path":"src/furo-de-bounce.js","properties":[{"name":"immediate","type":"boolean | null | undefined","description":"If true, input-wire is triggered immediatley (leading edge instead of trailing)
